content:
Outline:

I. Introduction

* Introduce Nate Diaz and his fighting name
* Explanation of his fighting style and qualities

II. Early Life and Fighting History

* Where he grew up and how he got into fighting
* Early fights in other organizations before joining UFC

III. UFC Career

* Show and explain early fights in UFC
* Voice-over commentary of key moments in fights
* Footage of training and preparation for fights

IV. Opponents and Fights

* Introduce opponents and show highlights to build up excitement for fights
* Staredowns before fights
* Recap of who won each fight

V. Conclusion

* Recap of Nate Diaz's career and achievements as a fighter
